title: FS T202 raw and graded incl. COBB!!

posts.post_title: FS T202 raw and graded incl. COBB!!
posts.post_content:
Purchases over $500 include shipping and insurance.  Purchases under $500 please add $5 for shipping.  All prices are net (check, money order, Paypal friends and family) to me.  Add 3% for Paypal goods and services.  Credit card available +4%.  Prices are subject to change without notice.  “I’ll take it” trumps any negotiations or offers.  PM or email me at [url]hcv123@att.net[/url]  to reserve.  I collect sales tax from NY state residents.

The numbers below are my opinion of what the cads would get if sent in for 3rd party grading.  

Raw
Ambrose McConnell at Bat  Blair/Quinn  G+  2.5  75.
Chase Ready for the Squeeze Play  Magee/Paskert  VG+  3.5  99.
Donlin Out at First  Dooin/Magee  pr-fr  1.5  49.
Hal Chase too Late  Mclean/Suggs  G+  2.5   69.
Just Before the Battle  Marquard/Myers  Poor 1  119.
Too Late for Devlin  Marquard/Myers  pr-fr  1.5  119.

Graded
Chief Bender Waiting for a Good One  Bender/Thomas  SGC  3.5  375.
Good Play at Third  Cobb/Moriarity  SGC 4  2999.
Just Before the Battle  Bresnahan/McGraw  SGC  2.5   249.
Ty Cobb Steals Third  Cobb/Jennings  SGC 3  2999. SALE PENDING

All graded cards were recently graded.

[quote name="hcv123" post=2227499]Cobb side AND center![/QUOTE]

THAT, sir, is a candidate for Holy Grail status. Incredible, GLWS!
